Blockchain OTP System

Enhanced security through smart contract verification

About This Project

The Blockchain OTP System is a hybrid solution that combines:

  • Rust backend for high-performance OTP generation and management
  • Yew WebAssembly frontend for a responsive user interface
  • Solidity smart contracts for secure on-chain OTP verification
  • Axum web framework for REST API endpoints

Getting Started

To run this project locally:

  1. Clone the repository: git clone https://github.com/sengkeat-dex/BLOCKCHAINOTP.git
  2. Install Rust and Trunk
  3. Build the project: cargo build
  4. Run the backend: cargo run
  5. Run the frontend: cd frontend && trunk serve

API Endpoints

  • GET /health - Health check endpoint

  • POST /otp/verify - Verify an OTP
